generic:link.msg:message: When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the legal name must be reported. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.
When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the nature of ownership must be reported. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.
When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the legal form must be reported. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.
When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the location of headquarters must be reported. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.
When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the countries of operation must be reported. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if (empty($V2)) then ((not(empty($V3)))and (not(empty($V4)))) else 'false') and (if (not(empty($V2))) then ((empty($V3)) and (empty($V4))) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the ratio of the annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median annual total compensation for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual) must be reported. If this information is not reported, a reason for omission must be provided.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if (empty($V2)) then ((not(empty($V3)))and (not(empty($V4)))) else 'false') and (if (not(empty($V2))) then ((empty($V3)) and (empty($V4))) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, the ratio of the percentage increase in annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median percentage increase in annual total compensation for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual) must be reported. If this information is not reported, a reason for omission must be provided.

The ratio of the annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median annual total compensation for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual) should be equal to or greater than 1.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if (empty($V2)) then ((not(empty($V3)))and (not(empty($V4)))) else 'false') and (if (not(empty($V2))) then ((empty($V3)) and (empty($V4))) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, any contextual information necessary to understand the data and how the data has been compiled must be reported. If this information is not reported, a reason for omission must be provided.

The ratio of the percentage increase in annual total compensation for the organization’s highest-paid individual to the median percentage increase in annual total compensation for all employees (excluding the highest-paid individual) should not be negative.
The legal form should be specified.

When reporting in accordance with the GRI Standards, if legal form is selected as "Others" THEN provide description for others must be specified. Reasons for omission are not permitted for this disclosure.
